scripts.ai:down: cd apps/ai && docker compose -f docker-compose.self-hosted.yml down
scripts.ai:logs: cd apps/ai && docker compose -f docker-compose.self-hosted.yml logs -f wbot-ai
scripts.ai:restart: cd apps/ai && docker compose -f docker-compose.self-hosted.yml restart wbot-ai
scripts.ai:up: cd apps/ai && docker compose -f docker-compose.self-hosted.yml up -d
scripts.db:generate-types: pnpm exec supabase gen types typescript --linked > packages/shared/src/types/database.ts
scripts.dev:ai: cd apps/ai && uv run uvicorn src.api.server:app --reload --port 2024
scripts.docs:generate: cd apps/ai && (uv run python ../../scripts/ai_docs/staleness.py --json > ../../staleness.json || true) && uv run python ../../scripts/ai_docs/generator.py --stale ../../staleness.json; rm -f ../../staleness.json
scripts.langgraph:dev: cd apps/ai && uv run langgraph dev --port 2024
scripts.langgraph:up: cd apps/ai && uv run langgraph up
scripts.redis:local:start: docker run -d --name wbot-redis -p 6379:6379 redis:alpine && echo 'Redis started on localhost:6379'
scripts.redis:local:status: docker ps --filter name=wbot-redis --format '{{.Status}}' || echo 'Redis not running'
scripts.redis:local:stop: docker stop wbot-redis && docker rm wbot-redis && echo 'Redis stopped'
scripts.eval:activity: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli activity
scripts.eval:activity:haiku: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli activity --models haiku
scripts.eval:activity:gemini-flash: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli activity --models gemini-flash
scripts.eval:activity:gemini-lite: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli activity --models gemini-lite
scripts.eval:activity:glm: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli activity --models glm-4.7
scripts.eval:activity:glm-flash: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli activity --models glm-flash
scripts.eval:activity:glm-flashx: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli activity --models glm-flashx
scripts.eval:conversation: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli conversation
scripts.eval:conversation:haiku: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli conversation --models haiku
scripts.eval:conversation:gemini-flash: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli conversation --models gemini-flash
scripts.eval:conversation:glm: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli conversation --models glm-4.7
scripts.eval:conversation:glm-flash: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli conversation --models glm-flash
scripts.eval:all: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli all
scripts.eval:all:budget: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli all --profile budget
scripts.eval:all:quality: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli all --profile quality
scripts.eval:datasets: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli create-datasets
scripts.eval:models: cd apps/ai && uv run python -m src.eval.cli list-models
scripts.web:build: bash -c 'if [ ! -f .env ]; then echo "Missing .env at repo root"; exit 1; fi; set -a; . ./.env; set +a; DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker build -t wbot-web:latest -f apps/web/Dockerfile --build-arg VITE_SUPABASE_URL --build-arg VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY --build-arg VITE_LANGGRAPH_API_URL .'
scripts.web:down: docker stop wbot-web && docker rm wbot-web
scripts.web:status: docker ps --filter name=wbot-web --format '{{.Status}}' || echo 'Web not running'

apps/ai/**/*.py: bash -c 'cd apps/ai && uv run ruff check --fix'
bash -c 'cd apps/ai && uv run ruff format'
